AD.name: Directories
AD.description: List of directories to scan for bundles to install.

AD.name: Poll Intervall
AD.description: How many milliseconds time to sleep between directory scans.

AD.name: Use Initial Start Level
AD.description: Do not assign any start level to bundles installed by the dirdeployer. This means that they will use the initial start level set using the FrameworkStartLevel-API.

AD.name: Start level
AD.description: The start level to assign to bundles installed by the dirdeployer bundle when 'Use Initial Start Level' is set to false.

AD.name: Uninstall all on stop
AD.description: When set to true the dirdeployer bundle will uninstall all bundles it has installed when it is stopped.

AD.name: Use file markers
AD.description: When set to true file markers will be used to control and monitor the deployment

AD.name: Use bundle controls
AD.description: When set to true DeployedBundleControls will be registered for every deployed bundle jar file
